patterns.name: Morning Productivity Peak
patterns.description: Task completion rate is 40% higher between 9-11 AM compared to afternoon hours.

patterns.name: Post-Meeting Energy Drop
patterns.description: Heart rate and focus scores decrease by 15% in the hour following meetings longer than 45 minutes.

patterns.name: Exercise-Sleep Quality Link
patterns.description: Days with 30+ minutes of exercise correlate with 25% better deep sleep quality.

patterns.name: Context Switching Cost
patterns.description: Switching between projects more than 3 times per day reduces overall productivity by 30%.

patterns.name: Optimal Work Block Duration
patterns.description: 90-minute focused work sessions yield highest completion rates with minimal fatigue.
